h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 8\. Look for Enemies With Blue Glowing Outlines
content: When you’re exploring areas, you’ll sometimes encounter enemies that have bright blue glowing outlines around them. These enemies drop spirits, which you can add to your collection and equip at any time to help you out during fights.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '8\. Look for Enemies With Blue Glowing Outlines'.
The content is as follows:
When you’re exploring areas, you’ll sometimes encounter enemies that have bright blue glowing outlines around them. These enemies drop spirits, which you can add to your collection and equip at any time to help you out during fights.
